(Simplified: 铼)
Chinese Definition:
①一種金屬元素，熔點3180℃，高熔點金屬之一，用來製造電燈絲、人造衛星和火箭的外殼、原子反應堆的防護板等，化學上用做催化劑。

錸字的基本解释

錸
lái
见“铼”。

錸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lái］
“铼1”的繁体字。
化学元素。符号Re。是最分散的稀有金属之一。机械强度高，耐高温，耐腐蚀。用来制造电灯灯丝、人造卫星和火箭的外壳、原子反应堆的防护板和测量高温的热电偶。铼的合金用来制造自来水笔的笔尖等。

rhenium
Basic explanation of words
rhenium
lái
See "Rhenium".
rhenium
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lái］
Traditional characters for "铼1".
chemical element. Symbol Re. It is one of the most dispersed rare metals. High mechanical strength, high temperature resistance and corrosion resistance. It is used to make filaments of electric lamps, shells of artificial satellites and rockets, protective plates of atomic reactors, and thermocouples to measure high temperatures. The alloy of rhenium is used to make the nibs of fountain pens, etc.
